channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens AG -- Automation License Manager 5
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens AG -- Automation License Manager 5

item.title: CVE-2020-7583|2024-08-04T09:33:19.886Z -- siemens%20ag -- automation%20license%20manager%205
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Automation License Manager 5 (All versions), Automation License Manager 6 (All versions < V6.0.8). The application does not properly validate the users' privileges when executing some operations, which could allow a user with low permissions to arbitrary modify files that should be protected against writing.
